杒字的基本解释

杒
rèn
古书上说的一种树。
古同“轫”，支住车轮不使转动的木头。

杒
ér
古代一种束在车輈上的皮制装饰。

杒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèn］
［《廣韻》而振切，去震，日。］
亦作“梕1”。
(1)木名。
(2)同“軔”。使车轮停止转动的木头，车启动时需抽去。
[②]［ér］
［《集韻》人之切，平之，日。］
亦作“梕2”。
小车楘，古代车輈上用的皮制装饰件。

杒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杒； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页511第18
【唐韻】而震切【集韻】【韻會】而振切，?音刃。【說文】桎杒也。【玉篇】木名。或作梕。　又【集韻】【類篇】?人之切，音而。小車楘。

杒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
杒字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。也指古代一种束在车輈上的皮制装饰。

Dazzle
Basic explanation of words
Dazzle
rèn
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
In ancient times, it is the "breast", the wood that supports the wheel not to turn.
Dazzle
ér
An ancient leather decoration tied to the wheel of a car.
Dazzle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèn］
["Guangyun" and vibrate, go to vibrate, day. ]
Also known as "梕1".
(1) Wooden name.
(2) Same as "Shi". The wood that stops the wheels must be removed when the car starts.
[②]［ér］
["Jiyun" Cut, Pingzhi, Day. ]
Also known as "梕2".
Trolleys, leather decorations used on ancient carts.
Dazzle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杒; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 511 18
[Tang Yun] and vibrating [Jiyun] [Rhyme] and vibrating,? Sound blade. [Said the text] 桎杒也. [Jade articles] Wooden names. Or as a shackle.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? The cut of people, the sound. Trolley.
Dazzle

Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books. It also refers to an ancient leather decoration tied to the wheel of a car.
